attrTexture.name: texture
attrTexture.comment: filename that points to a texture .exr or .tx file (must be mip-mapped and tiled with maketx).

attrWrapAround.name: wrap_around
attrWrapAround.label: wrap around
attrWrapAround.comment: Controls whether to repeat (true) or clamp (false) the texture

attrNormalEncoding.name: normal_encoding
attrNormalEncoding.label: normal encoding
attrNormalEncoding.comment: Most normal maps are encoded [0,1].   Only certain rare floating point normal maps are encoded [-1,1]
